DB-->>ServerAction: rows ServerAction-->>Hook: { success, data } Hook->>TagSearchBar: favorites[] end User->>TagSearchBar: ãŠæ°—ã«å…¥ã‚Šã‚¿ãƒ–é¸æŠ TagSearchBar->>TagSearchBar: favorites ã‚’è¡¨ç¤º ``` ## Estimated code review effort ğŸ¯ 3 (Moderate) | â±ï¸ ~22 åˆ† ## Possibly related PRs - udondon1478/Project-PS#144 â€” ProductSearch ã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚·ã‚°ãƒãƒãƒ£å¤‰æ›´ã¨é‡è¤‡ã™ã‚‹å¤‰æ›´ãŒã‚ã‚‹ãŸã‚ç«¶åˆç¢ºèªãŒå¿…è¦ã€‚ - udondon1478/Project-PS#221 â€” TagSearchBar ã®ææ¡ˆãƒ¬ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°å¤‰æ›´ã¨ favorites ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒ—ã®é‡ãªã‚ŠãŒã‚ã‚‹ãŸã‚ç¢ºèªæ¨å¥¨ã€‚ ## æ¦‚è¦ ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãŒãŠæ°—ã«å…¥ã‚Šæ¤œç´¢ã‚’ä¿å­˜ãƒ»ç®¡ç†ã§ãã‚‹æ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒã€Prismaãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã€ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã€ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ ãƒ•ãƒƒã‚¯ã€UI ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’å®Ÿè£…ã—ã¦ã€æ¤œç´¢ã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒªã®ä¿å­˜ãƒ»å–å¾—ãƒ»å‰Šé™¤ãƒ»ãƒªãƒãƒ¼ãƒ æ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’å®Ÿç¾ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ ## å¤‰æ›´å†…å®¹ |ã‚³ãƒ›ãƒ¼ãƒˆ / ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«|æ¦‚è¦| |---|---| |**ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒ**

performed_via_github_app.name: coderabbitai
performed_via_github_app.description:
# Transforming Code Reviews with AI

## Features

**Automated Reviews**: Continuous reviews of the pull requests including incremental commits. 

**Summarization**: Generates high-level summary and a technical walkthrough of the PR changes.Â 

**Line-by-line review**: Provides line-by-line suggestions committable with one click.

**Codebase verification**:  Verifies the impact on the overall codebase and identifies missing changes.

**Insights into your code**:  Ask any questions on your codebase within the pull request 

**Chat about your code** : Chat with the bot around your code.Â The more you chat, the smarter it gets.

**Issue Validation**:  Validates the PR against the linked issues and identifies other related issuesÂ
